General.Name: Suryalakshmi Cotton Mills Limited
General.Description: Suryalakshmi Cotton Mills Limited manufactures and sells cotton and blended yarns, denim fabrics, and garments in India, Bangladesh, Guatemala, Ethiopia, Madagascar, Mexico, Kenya, Singapore, South Korea, and internationally. The company provides spun polyester, polyester cotton combed/carded blend, polyester viscose blend, cotton OE and ring spun, slub and fancy, core spun elastane, 2 fold, eli-twisted, and compact yarns. The company also offers mercerized, coated, normal finish, cotton/polyester, yarn dyed/over dyed, and mill washed stretch and rigid denims. It serves private labels, fashion brands, and retail chains. The company was incorporated in 1962 and is based in Secunderabad, India.
